name: HardBall '94 [SG]
description:
The legendary space ship 0-94 mysteriously got warped into a green maze. Help the crew to escape and kill every stupid alien, that dares to cross your way!

The controls are:

left - right / a - s -rotate the ship

up / w -thrust

spacebar -shoot

The game is not finished yet ^^

Thanks for playing and have fun!
